mapper.select: select i.id , i.nombre as nombre, i.descripcion as descripcion, i.fechalanzamiento as fechalanzamiento , i.tarifaxdia as tarifaxdia , i.formatorenta as formatorenta, i.genero as genero, ti.id as ti_id, ti.descripcion as ti_descripcion FROM VI_ITEMS as i left join VI_TIPOITEM as ti on i.TIPOITEM_id=ti.id ;

select i.id , i.nombre as nombre, i.descripcion as descripcion, i.fechalanzamiento as fechalanzamiento , i.tarifaxdia as tarifaxdia , i.formatorenta as formatorenta, i.genero as genero, ti.id as ti_id, ti.descripcion as ti_descripcion FROM VI_ITEMS as i left join VI_TIPOITEM as ti on i.TIPOITEM_id=ti.id WHERE i.id=#{iditem};
SELECT i.id as i_id, i.nombre as i_nombre FROM VI_ITEMS as i left join VI_ITEMRENTADO as ir on i.id = ir.ITEMS_id WHERE ir.ITEMS_id IS NULL;
